title: A Thing of Dark Imaginings
description: Amir's only child, Lelah, is murdered in a mass campus shooting. Amir begins to fall into psychosis, the symptoms growing worse with time. He sees things and hears things which are not real. From a corner of his mind, an angry voice begins to talk to him and threaten him. It wants revenge on the people whom it blames for Lelah's death - "gun people." Amir succumbs to the voice, loses control over his actions, and embarks on a journey of bloody retribution. Thus begins a battle for his mind, his life, his family, and his soul.ALSO AVAILABLE AT APPLE, BARNES & NOBLE, AND WALMART.
author: Roger Alan Bonner
